original_text: They say to the seers, ‘Do not see any more visions!’ They say to the prophets, ‘Do not tell us messages about what is right! Tell us nice things, even if they are not true. They say to the seers, ‘Do not see any more visions!’ They say to the prophets, ‘Do not tell us messages about what is right! Tell us nice things, even if they are not true.
korean_text: 그들이 선견자들에게 이르기를 선견하지 말라 선지자들에게 이르기를 우리에게 바른 것을 보이지 말라 우리에게 부드러운 말을 하라 거짓된 것을 보이라

sentences.original_text: 'Do not tell us messages about what is right!'
sentences.korean_translation: '우리에게 옳은 것에 대한 메시지를 말하지 말라!'

sentences.original_text: even if they are not true.
